_header: He beheld ladies with laughing cheer
_description: The Song of Roland — 1049 lines in alliterative couplets

BLLan388.First Lines:
He beheld ladys with laughinge cheerThen lightid gwynylon and com
                    In in fer…
BLLan388.Last Lines:
…Angry in hert thus gan he nevynbroder let be all siche
                    sawes
BLLan388.Note:
Ends imperfectly. Folio number reflects the most recent
                    foliation.
